content:
cds-hooks-bot opened Issue #352

## May 2018 Ballot Comment 146

Submitted by Walter Suarez from Kaiser Permanente

Chapter: Hooks
Section: Overview
Type: A-S :bulb:
In Person Requested? No

Comment:
I found it a bit difficult to follow the organization/structure and flow of the Hooks section. It would be helpful to include a paragraph as part of the Overview, right before the "Hook Context and prefetch" section, that describes the structure/topics being covered in the Hookls section (Hook context and prefetch; Hook definition format; Changes to the Definition of a Hook, etc.)

_This issue was imported by @cds-hooks-bot from the consolidated CDS Hooks May 2018 ballot spreadsheet._

cds-hooks-bot edited Issue #352

## May 2018 Ballot Comment 146

Submitted by Walter Suarez from Kaiser Permanente

Chapter: Hooks
Section: Overview
Type: A-S :bulb:
In Person Requested? No

Comment:
I found it a bit difficult to follow the organization/structure and flow of the Hooks section. It would be helpful to include a paragraph as part of the Overview, right before the "Hook Context and prefetch" section, that describes the structure/topics being covered in the Hookls section (Hook context and prefetch; Hook definition format; Changes to the Definition of a Hook, etc.)

_This issue was imported by @cds-hooks-bot from the consolidated CDS Hooks May 2018 ballot spreadsheet._

cds-hooks-bot commented on Issue #352

Proposed Disposition: Persuasive with Mod
Proposed Disposition Comment:
We agree and we will be merging the hooks.md into the 1.0.md and clarifying the hooks section to make this more clear to address this ballot comment.

cds-hooks-bot commented on Issue #352

## :telephone_receiver: CDS Working Group Block Vote (5-30-2018)

Meeting notes: http://wiki.hl7.org/index.php?title=File:2018-05-30_CDS_WG_Call_Minutes.docx

Julia Skapik moved the following disposition, seconded by @brynrhodes.

Disposition: Persuasive with Mod
Disposition Comment:
We agree and we will be merging the hooks.md into the 1.0.md and clarifying the hooks section to make this more clear to address this ballot comment.

:+1: For: 12
:expressionless: Abstain: 0
:-1: Against: 0

:tada: The motion passed! :tada:

isaacvetter commented on Issue #352

Resolved in PR #426. Closing.
